subject: Technology
title: Weather Satellites and Forecasting
description: Learn Weather Satellites and Forecasting in one minute.

hook.text: Before satellites, a hurricane could appear with almost no warning. Thousands died in surprise storms.

buildup.text: The first weather satellite, TIROS-1, launched in 1960. It sent back grainy images of cloud patterns.

discovery.text: For the first time, meteorologists could see entire weather systems from above, tracking their movement.

twist.text: Modern weather satellites can detect a forming hurricane days before it becomes dangerous.

climax.text: Satellite forecasting saves thousands of lives each year by giving people time to evacuate.

punchline.text: Cameras in space tell you whether to carry an umbrella.
